title: Matrix Metrics
text:
Mission statement
We believe ecological and social systems are critically interconnected in the landscape. In the vocabulary of agroecology, the matrix describes places in the landscape where people and nature interact. We are committed to using our expertise to find solutions that support a sustainable and functioning matrix, that are responsive to local communities, support people’s health and needs, and restore natural systems.
Matrix Metrics is a limited liability company.

title: Kevin Li
text:
Kevin is a landscape- and agro-ecologist who is also trained in landscape architecture. He uses his unique background to take a data-driven approach to ecological landscape design. His work also aims to make environmental data accessible and actionable for communities and decision makers. He has expertise in geographic information systems (GIS), statistical analysis, and data visualization, as well as hands-on experience in ecological restoration, stewardship, and landscape design.
Through his research and consulting work, Kevin is dedicated to creating landscapes that meet human and ecological needs and foster resilient communities for people and nature.
